tool_description: The US Sales Tax API provides accurate tax rates for all of the US States by zip codes (see full list of supported States at the end of the description). The team is working to release additional endpoints very soon.
name: US Sales Tax API
title: US Sales Tax API

api_list.name: Calculate price after US sales tax
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the price after tax (i.e. price inclusive of US Sales Tax)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-sales-tax-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/calculatetax"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-sales-tax-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: US Sales Tax Rates by Zip Code
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the combined US Sales Tax rate for a specific zip code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-sales-tax-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/rates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-sales-tax-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
